title: Ep. 41 - The Kiss Quotient by Helen Hoang (PART 1)
itunes:title: Ep. 41 - The Kiss Quotient by Helen Hoang (PART 1)
description:
Get ready for some squee HBs, we're here gushing over the first half of The Kiss Quotient by Helen Hoang! Scientist/mathematician + male escort/fashion designer?! Neuroatypical heroine?! Hapa hero?! We are very here for this. Plus all the heart-felt romance and red hot sexy times you can handle. And consent! So, so much consent on the page. Melody was in hog heaven. 
 We have limited experience with autism particularly and the neurodiverse community in general, so if you feel inspired to correct us on something we said, please don't hesitate to email heavingbosomspodcast@gmail.com!
 Bonus Content:
 Pig roasts, gelato teenagers, how Melody eats candy, how Erin can't sing, the best Army pun EVER, pheromones, Mr. Spenglish, and so much more. 
 Patren Shout Out: 
 Jackie G., you are a fairy of fortitude and friendship. You will use anything at your disposal, all the tricks up your sleeve, to help the ones you love, and your mischievous imagination makes you a hoot to be around.
 Thank you to all of our patrons! If you want to join the ranks head to https://www.patreon.com/heavingbosomspodcast
 Thank you to everyone who's subscribed, rated, and reviewed! It helps us so much! 
 Follow us on social media! 
 Instagram: @heavingbosoms
 Twitter: @heaving_bosoms
 Facebook: Heaving Bosoms Podcast
 Closed Facebook Group: The Heaving Bosoms Podcast Geriatric Friendship Cult
 www.heavingbosomspodcast.com
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)
